campaignPerformance.name: Sunshine Coast PMAX  | LS
campaignPerformance.verdict: Losing money — restructure or reduce spend

campaignPerformance.name: Sunshine Coast - Incremental Search | LS
campaignPerformance.verdict: Losing money — restructure or reduce spend

campaignPerformance.name: Search Brand | LS
campaignPerformance.verdict: Losing money — restructure or reduce spend

keyInsights.insight: 3 campaign(s) losing ~$2,611/month: Sunshine Coast PMAX  | LS (0.49x ROAS on $3,861), Sunshine Coast - Incremental Search | LS (0.6x ROAS on $1,285), Search Brand | LS (0.54x ROAS on $277).
$637 spent on 31 zero-conversion search terms (70% of visible spend).
2 low-QS keywords costing ~$123/month in CPC premiums.
Only 22% Search Impression Share — missing 78% of eligible searches.

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 14 conversion actions (6x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 2x ENGAGEMENT, 2x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 2x CONTACT, 1x UNKNOWN). Recording 25 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Not enabled. With 25 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 6 conversion categories: 6x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 2x ENGAGEMENT, 2x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 2x CONTACT, 1x UNKNOWN.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Potential duplicates: 2x "phone" actions; 6x "call" actions; 2x "lead" actions; 2x "form" actions; 2x "submit" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: No GA4 conversion actions found. Link GA4 for cross-device tracking and audience insights.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 14 actions recording 25 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $637 spent on 31 zero-conversion search terms (70% of $903 visible search spend). Top waste: "family lawyers sunshine coast" $116, "bayside lawyers" $49, "lawyer maroochydore" $45, "luke shanahan lawyer" $36, "family lawyers" $32.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 8 list(s) with 14291 total negatives. Good coverage with themed lists.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 14291 negative keywords across 8 lists. Ensure lists are attached to all active campaigns.

checks.name: Broad match performance
checks.finding: Broad match: $1,235 spend, 6 conv, $206 CPA. Exact: $277 spend, 1 conv, $277 CPA.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: 6 keywords spent $250 with 0 conversions in 30d. Top waste: "child custody dispute" $100, "Family Lawyers near me" $50, "shanahan lawyers" $46, "luke shanahan lawyer" $36, "shanahan family law maroochydore" $10.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 3 naming prefix(es) across 5 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 5 ad groups across 5 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 5 campaigns: 4 SEARCH, 1 PERFORMANCE_MAX.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: Brand campaign exists — protects branded terms from competitors.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: PMax active — cross-channel reach across Search, Display, YouTube, Gmail, Maps, Discover.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: Both Search and PMax active — PMax takes priority for exact match queries. Use brand exclusions in PMax and monitor cannibalization.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 5 campaigns, $265/day budget, 22% Search Impression Share. Worst: Search Brand | LS (0.54x ROAS, $277). $5,423/month on below-1x-ROAS or zero-conversion campaigns.

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $265/day budget, ~$181/day actual spend (68% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: Correctly using "Presence" targeting.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 7.3/10 across 9 scored keywords (6 at 7+, 3 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$123/month. Top offenders: "family lawyers sunshine coast" QS 4 ($717 spend, ~$115 premium), "Family Lawyers near me" QS 4 ($50 spend, ~$8 premium).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 5267 of 6130 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 7.3 indicates good keyword-to-ad relevance.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 27 RSAs: 10 Good/Excellent, 17 need improvement (3 GOOD, 7 EXCELLENT, 6 PENDING, 8 POOR, 3 AVERAGE).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: 1 PMax campaign(s). Sunshine Coast PMAX  | LS: $3,861 spend, 0.49x ROAS, $214 CPA, 18 conv. Below 1x ROAS — review asset groups and audience signals.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 3.12%. Room for improvement — industry average is 4-7% for Search.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Smart bidding active: MAXIMIZE_CONVERSIONS, MAXIMIZE_CONVERSION_VALUE, TARGET_IMPRESSION_SHARE.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 22% Search Impression Share — missing 78% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: 25 conversions/month with Manual CPC. Sufficient for Smart Bidding — test Target ROAS or Target CPA.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 71 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 16 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 2 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 224 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 5 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 7 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: No Customer Match lists. Upload CRM emails/phones for lookalike targeting and customer exclusion.

quickWins.action: Pause or restructure "Sunshine Coast PMAX  | LS" — 0.49x ROAS on $3,861, losing ~$1,969/month.
Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "family lawyers sunshine coast", "bayside lawyers", "lawyer maroochydore"... — $637 wasted.
Pause or restructure "Sunshine Coast - Incremental Search | LS" — 0.6x ROAS on $1,285, losing ~$514/month.
Pause 6 zero-conversion keywords: "child custody dispute", "Family Lawyers near me", "shanahan lawyers"... — $250 wasted.
Improve 2 keywords with QS below 5 — est. $123/month CPC premium. Worst: "family lawyers sunshine coast" QS 4.
Fix: Enhanced conversions — Not enabled. With 25 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.
Fix: Server-side tracking — No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.

items: 3 campaign(s) are losing money ($2,611/month): Sunshine Coast PMAX  | LS (0.49x ROAS, $3,861), Sunshine Coast - Incremental Search | LS (0.6x ROAS, $1,285), Search Brand | LS (0.54x ROAS, $277). Restructure keywords/targeting or reduce budget.
$637 wasted on 31 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "family lawyers sunshine coast", "bayside lawyers", "lawyer maroochydore", "luke shanahan lawyer", "family lawyers".
2 keywords with QS below 5 are costing ~$123 extra/month in CPC premiums. Improve ad relevance and landing page alignment for these keywords.
Build remarketing audiences (all visitors 30d, cart abandoners, converters) and upload Customer Match lists from CRM.
Pause or restructure 6 zero-conversion keywords to recover $250/month.
Increase Search Impression Share from 22% — you're missing 78% of potential customers.
